meaning_str.bing:
n. 细节；详情；琐事；细微之处
v. 详细说明；详述；详细列举；派遣
网络. 细部；详图；明细

细节；详情；琐事；细微之处
详细说明；详述；详细列举；派遣

细节；详情；具体信息；（关于某事物的）资料；消息；（尤指军事上的）小分队；特遣队；次要部分；局部；细微之处；具体情况；零件；小项目；琐事
详细描述；详细说明；详细列举；详述；细说；指派（某人）执行特定任务；选派；派遣；分遣

1.en: National newspapers covered it in detail, including dramatic confrontations between Darrow and Bryan both in and out of the courtroom.
1.cn: 全美报刊作了详细报道，包括达娄和布莱恩两人在法庭进进出出当中戏剧性的对抗。

2.en: My camera and camcorder were unable to pick up the detail of the lights in the sky near as well as the naked eye could.
2.cn: 我的相机和摄像机不能捕捉到在天空中很近肉眼也能看得很清楚光源的细节。

3.en: The Leonardo drawing shown in this lesson is a good example of his careful study of every detail.
3.cn: 我们这一课所展示的列奥纳多的绘画就是他对所有事物都仔细推敲的一个很好的例子。

0.en: Unbelievable detail. Ticket. May I see your ticket？
0.cn: 这细节刻画地真赞。您的车票，请出示您的车票。

1.en: I don't have to read it. I know every painful detail.
1.cn: 我不用读，我了解所有痛苦的细节。

2.en: Of course he would remember every detail. His wife was murdered.
2.cn: 他当然会记得所有的细节，他妻子被谋杀了。

3.en: But in here, every detail adds up to something. Even you, Lawrence.
3.cn: 但在这里，每个细节都有所意义，即便是你也一样，劳伦斯。

4.en: They all think it's about more detail. But that's not how memory works.
4.cn: 他们都觉得真实的记忆就该细节丰富。但其实并非如此。

5.en: Yes. I think people underestimate the importance of detail to the overall impact. Yeah.
5.cn: 是啊。我觉得人们会低估注重细节对整体感觉的影响。是啊。

6.en: Oh, one small detail, this is an all-gay bowling league, so I told everyone you're all gay.
6.cn: 一个小细节，这是基佬保龄球联赛，所以我跟大家说你是基佬。

7.en: And so, I set myself the task of finding it. I created what I imagined biological life to be like down to the most minute detail.
7.cn: 于是，我以找到那生命为己任生命形态创造刻画每一寸细节。

8.en: The attention to detail is... It's just… It is, yes. I've got, I mean, I'm sorry, I'm a little overwhelmed by the moment. It's just…
8.cn: 你对细节的注重简直是...没错。我有...我...抱歉， 我现在有点不知所措。就是…

9.en: It's a melting pot, and it's a mosaic that even if we look up close we'll still see the colors and the flavors of each culture in detail.
9.cn: 这是一个大熔炉，是一个马赛克，如果你凑近看，还能看从细节上看到每一种文化的颜色与风味。

10.en: The very spot where he died? The fact that his skull had been crushed with a rock? That they buried him in an unmarked grave? I mean the detail of all that.
10.cn: 知道他牺牲的确切地点，知道他的脑袋被石头砸扁了？知道他们把他葬在无名冢里，这么多细节。

11.en: Yes, but before you go, just take a look around this room. Study every detail, every aspect. Because this is the last time you will ever step foot in here.
11.cn: 是啊，但你走之前，好好看看这间屋子。仔细看每处细节，每个方面。因为这是你最后一次踏进这里了

12.en: I just told every detail I know to whoever I got off the phone with an hour ago. I don't know what you guys are doing. I promise you, Mr. Kim, we are taking this very seriously. And as a parent myself, I can only imagine what you must be feeling. But for me to help you, I do need to know how everything unfolded from your eyes.
12.cn: 我一个小时前刚刚给电话里的人讲了我知道的每一个细节。真不知道你们这些人在干什么。我向你保证，金先生，我们非常重视这件事。我也是一个母亲，我完全理解你的感受。但是站在帮助你的立场上，我必须知道所有的事情从你的视角是怎样的。

13.en: You know those girls text me every detail of their lives as it happens.
13.cn: 要知道她们都会把生活中的每件事都发短信告诉我。

14.en: How could I ever acquire enough detail to make them think that it's reality?
14.cn: 梦境如何设计才令他们相信置身现实。

15.en: Then get her detail on the phone. I did. They can't force her to talk to you, sir.
15.cn: 那就打给她的保安。我打了，他们不能逼她跟您说话，先生。

16.en: You were the conduit for AGRA. Every assignment, every detail they got from you. It was my job.
16.cn: 你是阿格拉的联络人。每次任务，所有讯息都是从你这儿来的。这是我的职责。

17.en: Okay, we have a lot to do and not much time to do it. Bernadette, you're on corn, gravy and yam detail.
17.cn: 好了，我们时间不多，但有很多事要做，Bernadette，你处理玉米，肉汁和山药。

18.en: I am the head of your detail here in Dallas, ma'am, and I've been ordered to keep you securely in this house.
18.cn: 我是您在达拉斯的保安主管，夫人。我得到命令要保护您安全留在屋内。

19.en: I do run the place! Or, at least, I know every detail of how it's run. And I ought to be told about any proposed changes.
19.cn: 本来就是我在经营！至少我非常了解医院的方方面面，我理应知道任何改动建议。
